scripts.api:deploy: npx gh-pages-clean && npx gh-pages -a -m "Deploy to iptv-org/api" -d .api -r https://$GITHUB_TOKEN@github.com/iptv-org/api.git -x
scripts.playlist:deploy: npx gh-pages-clean && npx gh-pages -m "Deploy to GitHub Pages" -d .gh-pages -r https://$GITHUB_TOKEN@github.com/iptv-org/iptv.git -x
scripts.format: npm run db:create && npm run playlist:format
scripts.check: npm run api:load && npm run playlist:lint && npm run playlist:validate
scripts.update: npm run api:load && npm run db:create && npm run playlist:generate && npm run api:generate && npm run readme:update
scripts.deploy: npm run playlist:deploy && npm run api:deploy
